    • Develop and evaluate biomedical time series data clustering models based on Fluctuation Based Clustering (FBC)

Cluster Earth Mover Distance Square Matrix data

Source: R/clustering.R
clust_matrix.Rd

Cluster Earth Mover Distance Square Matrix data

clust_matrix(matrix, method, nclust, plotclust)

Arguments

matrix

Object of type matrix storing Earth Mover's Distances for patient time series data distribution pairs

method

Clustering method (hierarchical, kmeans, diana, fanny, som, modelbased, sota, pam, clara)

nclust

Number of clusters (if not specified, user will be asked in the terminal)

plotclust

TRUE/FALSE if clustering data should be visualized (TRUE by default)

Value

Object of type list storing cluster data and clustering assignments for the Patient_IDs from the Earth Mover's Distance matrix

Examples

list <- patient_list('.../ts_demofiles1') #Just folder; files can be pulled from GitHub demo files
#> Error in patient_list(".../ts_demofiles1"): could not find function "patient_list"
#(https://github.com/MrMaximumMax/FBCanalysis/tree/master/demo_and_testfiles/ts_demofiles1)
#Sampling frequency is supposed to be daily
matrix <- emd_matrix(list, "FEV1")
#> Error in emd_matrix(list, "FEV1"): could not find function "emd_matrix"
clustering <- clust_matrix(matrix, method = "hierarchical", nclust = 2)
#> Error in clust_matrix(matrix, method = "hierarchical", nclust = 2): could not find function "clust_matrix"
